2812.TW.summary: Taichung Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. provides various banking products and services in Taiwan. The company offers various deposit products, such as passbooks, check deposits, certificates of deposit, and negotiable certificates of deposit. Its loan portfolio comprises general, project, policy, syndication, international trade finance, mortgage, subordinate mortgages and small-amount credit, and auto loans, as well as credit cards. The company is also involved in foreign exchange operations, including import, export, and foreign exchange activities, as well as foreign currency deposits and loans; the provision of e-banking services, such as personal/corporate online banking, mobile banking, Web ATM, all-round collection business, evaluation and management of automation equipment settings, and account-link services with e-commerce platforms; and TWD and foreign-currency capital management, foreign exchange trading, securities trading, and long-term equity investment activities. In addition, it offers wealth management; trust services, including specific money trust funds, securities certification, real estate-related trust, advance payment trust, specific-purpose and individually managed money trust, and custody of securities investment trust; and financial instruments and financial advisory services. Further, the company engages in insurance brokerage, leasing, and securities and futures businesses. As of December 31, 2019, it had 81 branches, a Malaysia Labuan branch, and an offshore banking unit. The company was formerly known as Taichung Small and Medium Business Bank Company Limited and changed its name to Taichung Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. in December 1998. Taichung Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

2836.TW.summary: Bank of Kaohsiung Co., Ltd. provides commercial banking products and services primarily in Taiwan. The company offers Taiwan dollar and foreign exchange deposits. It also provides personal loans, such as consumer, mortgage, reverse mortgage, and student loans, as well as personal overdrafts; and business loans comprising unsecured and secured overdrafts, short-term unsecured and secured loans, bank discounts, discount notes loans, general export financing, procurement loans, general commercial loans, guarantees and acceptances, and SME and emergency financing services. In addition, the company offers foreign exchange services, including import and export business, remittances and deposits, outright forwards, swaps, and margin trade, as well as structured products; offshore banking services; foreign exchange deposits; investment management services, such as offshore bonds services, funds, and life and non-life insurance services; credit cards; electronic banking services; and trust services. It operates approximately 36 branch offices, including one offshore banking unit and two mini-branches. The company was formerly known as City Bank of Kaohsiung Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Bank of Kaohsiung Co., Ltd. in January 1994. Bank of Kaohsiung Co., Ltd. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

It operates approximately 36 branch offices, including one offshore banking unit and two mini-branches. 2849.TW.summary: EnTie Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. provides banking products and services primarily in Taiwan. The company offers accounts and deposits. It also provides loans and overdrafts. In addition, the company offers consumer finance and wealth management products; and engages in the corporate and financial market operations. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2887.TW.summary: Taishin Financial Holding Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, provides various financial products and services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers wealth management services to individuals, households, and business owners; consumer loans, micro corporate loans, and credit cards to individuals, as well as payment processing services for merchants; digital banking services; wholesale banking services for multinationals, corporations, small and medium sized enterprises, government agencies, and financial institutions; and financial market and trust services. It also provides securities underwriting, brokerage, margin lending, and security transfer services, as well as deals in futures; and property and life insurance brokerage services. In addition, the company engages in the acquisition, evaluation, auction, and management of delinquent loans; audit and consultation of construction plans, contract witness, and assessment and trade of real estate, etc.; lease, wholesale, and retail sale of machinery, precision machinery, motor vehicles, aircrafts, and vessels and components; and financial leasing and investment start-up activities. Further, it accepts mandates from customers, provides analytical opinions or recommendations on securities investment, acts as an agent for investment consultancy of offshore funds, and issues publications or holds lectures about securities investment and other related business. Additionally, the company offers securities investment trust funds; issues beneficial interest certificates; and invests and trades in securities, securities-related products, and other items. Taishin Financial Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2897.TW.summary: O-Bank Co., Ltd. provides various banking products and services in Taiwan, rest of Asia, and the United States. It offers corporate banking services, including short and long term financing for working capitals, guarantees, syndications, and factoring services, as well as general trade finance services, cross-strait banking services, and forfaiting services; and project finance and syndicated loan products. The company also provides trade financing services, such as export and import financing services; factoring services; cash management services, which include corporate internet banking, and payable and receivable management services; and financial advisory services for mergers and acquisitions, corporate restructuring, spin off, share swap, tender offer, management buyout, leveraged buyout, fund raising, and private placement. In addition, it offers foreign exchange deposits; foreign currency guarantees; export services; interest rate products consisting of cross currency swaps, interest rate options, and interest rate swaps; exchange rate products, such as currency forward contract, currency options, and currency swaps; and structured products. Further, it provides securitization products, including real estate asset and asset backed securitization, and collateralized debt obligation services; monetary and property trust services, custodian services; financial consultancy services; and escrow services. The company was formerly known as Industrial Bank of Taiwan Co., Ltd. and changed its name to O-Bank Co., Ltd. in January 2017. O-Bank Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
